Notes: 1.ee_check: Entity Existence check (EE check). It only contains BasicEntity. 2.fv_check: Format Validity check (FV check). More stringent than the default FV check. 3.multi: Multi representation. 4.extend: For automatic extension of conditions. It only contains Entity or Relation. It usually used for the definition of predicate.

RightTriangle(ABC).doc_cn:
有一个角是直角的三角形称为直角三角形。
在直角△ABC中，∠ABC为直角，AB和BC是两个直角边。
RightTriangle(ABC).doc_en:
A triangle with one right angle is called a right triangle.
In the right triangle ABC, ∠ABC is the right angle, and AB and BC are the two legs.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: {A}{B}和{B}{C}是直角三角形{A}{B}{C}的两个直角边
anti_parse_to_nl_en: ∠{A}{B}{C} is the right angle of the right △ {A}{B}{C}
{A}{B} and {B}{C} are the legs of the right △ {A}{B}{C}
∠{A}{B}{C} is the right angle of the right triangle {A}{B}{C}
{A}{B} and {B}{C} are the legs of the right triangle {A}{B}{C}

IsoscelesTriangle(ABC).doc_cn:
两腰相等的三角形称为等腰三角形。
AB和AC是等腰三角形ABC的两腰。
IsoscelesTriangle(ABC).doc_en:
A triangle with two equal legs is called an isosceles triangle. 
AB and AC are the two equal legs of the isosceles triangle ABC.
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {A}{B} and {A}{C} are the legs of the isosceles △ {A}{B}{C}
∠{A}{B}{C} and ∠{B}{C}{A} are the base angles of the isosceles △ {A}{B}{C}
{A}{B} and {A}{C} are the legs of the isosceles triangle {A}{B}{C}
∠{A}{B}{C} and ∠{B}{C}{A} are the base angles of the isosceles triangle {A}{B}{C}

IsoscelesRightTriangle(ABC).doc_cn: 同时满足直角三角形和等腰三角形的三角形，是等腰直角三角形。
IsoscelesRightTriangle(ABC).doc_en: A triangle that satisfies the conditions of both a right triangle and an isosceles triangle is called an isosceles right triangle.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 三角形{A}{B}{C}为等腰直角三角形
∠{A}{B}{C}和∠{B}{C}{A}是等腰直角三角形{A}{B}{C}的底角
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {A}{B} and {A}{C} are the legs of the isosceles right △ {A}{B}{C}
∠{A}{B}{C} and ∠BCA are the base angles of the isosceles right △ {A}{B}{C}
∠CAB is the right angle of the isosceles right △ {A}{B}{C}
triangle {A}{B}{C} is an isosceles right triangle
{A}{B} and {A}{C} are the legs of the isosceles right triangle {A}{B}{C}
∠{A}{B}{C} and ∠{B}{C}{A} are the base angles of the isosceles right triangle {A}{B}{C}
∠{C}{A}{B} is the right angle of the isosceles right triangle {A}{B}{C}

EquilateralTriangle(ABC).doc_cn: 三条边相等的三角形称为等边三角形。
EquilateralTriangle(ABC).doc_en: A triangle with three equal sides is called an equilateral triangle.

Kite(ABCD).doc_cn: 两组临边相等的四边形称为风筝形。在风筝形ABCD中，AB和AD是一组临边，CB和CD是另一组临边。
Kite(ABCD).doc_en:
A quadrilateral with two pairs of adjacent sides equal is called a kite. 
In the kite ABCD, AB and AD are one pair of adjacent sides, and CB and CD are the other pair.
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {A}{B} and {A}{D} are one pair of adjacent sides of the kite {A}{B}{C}{D}
{C}{B} and {C}{D} are one pair of adjacent sides of the kite {A}{B}{C}{D}

Parallelogram(ABCD).doc_cn: 两组对边分别平行的四边形称为平行四边形。在平行四边形ABCD中，AD和BC是一组对边，BA和CD是另一组对边。
Parallelogram(ABCD).doc_en:
A quadrilateral with both pairs of opposite sides parallel is called a parallelogram. 
In the parallelogram ABCD, AD and BC are one pair of opposite sides, and BA and CD are the other pair.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: {A}{D}和{B}{C}是平行四边形{A}{B}{C}{D}的一组对边
{B}{A}和{C}{D}是平行四边形{A}{B}{C}{D}的一组对边
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {A}{D} and {B}{C} are opposite sides of the ▱ {A}{B}{C}{D}
{B}{A} and {C}{D} are opposite sides of the ▱ {A}{B}{C}{D}
{A}{D} and {B}{C} are opposite sides of the parallelogram {A}{B}{C}{D}
{B}{A} and {C}{D} are opposite sides of the parallelogram {A}{B}{C}{D}

Rhombus(ABCD).doc_cn: 四条边相等的四边形称为菱形。
Rhombus(ABCD).doc_en: A quadrilateral with four equal sides is called a rhombus.

Rectangle(ABCD).doc_cn: 四个角都是直角的四边形称为矩形。
Rectangle(ABCD).doc_en: A quadrilateral with four right angles is called a rectangle.

Square(ABCD).doc_cn: 四个角都是直角且四条边相等的四边形称为正方形。
Square(ABCD).doc_en: A quadrilateral with four right angles and four equal sides is called a square.

Trapezoid(ABCD).doc_cn:
一组对边平行且另一组对边延长后相交的四边形称为梯形。
在梯形ABCD中，AD和BC是平行边，AB和CD是梯形的腰。
Trapezoid(ABCD).doc_en:
A quadrilateral with one pair of parallel sides and another pair of sides that would intersect if extended is called a trapezoid. 
In the trapezoid ABCD, AD and BC are the parallel sides, and AB and CD are the non-parallel sides.
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {A}{D} and {B}{C} are the parallel sides of trapezoid {A}{B}{C}{D}
{A}{B} and {C}{D} are the non-parallel sides (legs) of trapezoid {A}{B}{C}{D}

IsoscelesTrapezoid(ABCD).doc_cn: 两腰相等的梯形称为等腰梯形。
IsoscelesTrapezoid(ABCD).doc_en: A trapezoid with two equal legs is called an isosceles trapezoid.
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {A}{D} and {B}{C} are the parallel sides of isosceles trapezoid {A}{B}{C}{D}
{A}{B} and {C}{D} are the non-parallel sides of isosceles trapezoid {A}{B}{C}{D}

RightTrapezoid(ABCD).doc_cn:
一侧角是直角的梯形称为直角梯形。
在直角梯形ABCD中，∠A和∠B为直角。
RightTrapezoid(ABCD).doc_en:
A trapezoid with one right angle is called a right-angled trapezoid. 
In the right-angled trapezoid ABCD, ∠A and ∠B are right angles.
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {A}{D} and {B}{C} are the parallel sides of right trapezoid {A}{B}{C}{D}
{A}{B} and {C}{D} are the non-parallel sides of right trapezoid {A}{B}{C}{D}
∠{D}{A}{B} and ∠{A}{B}{C} are the right angles of right trapezoid {A}{B}{C}{D}

IsMidpointOfLine(M,AB).doc_cn: 线段上到线段两端距离相等的点，称为线段的中点。
IsMidpointOfLine(M,AB).doc_en: Points on a segment that are equidistant from the two endpoints of the segment are called the midpoint of the segment.

IsMidpointOfArc(M,OAB).doc_cn: 弧上到弧两端距离相等的点，称为弧的中点。
IsMidpointOfArc(M,OAB).doc_en: Points on a arc that are equidistant from the two endpoints of the arc are called the midpoint of the arc.

ParallelBetweenLine(AB,CD).doc_cn:
线AB和线CD相互平行。
AB与CD是同方向的线段。
ParallelBetweenLine(AB,CD).doc_en:
Line AB and line CD are parallel to each other. 
AB and CD are collinear segments in the same direction.

PerpendicularBetweenLine(AO,CO).doc_cn:
线AO和线CO相互垂直。
∠AOC是直角。
PerpendicularBetweenLine(AO,CO).doc_en:
Line AO and line CO are mutually perpendicular.
∠AOC is a right angle.

IsPerpendicularBisectorOfLine(CO,AB).doc_cn: 若CO垂直于AB，与AB交于点O，且O是AB的重点，则线CO是线AB的垂直平分线。
IsPerpendicularBisectorOfLine(CO,AB).doc_en: If CO is perpendicular to AB, intersects AB at point O, and O is the midpoint of AB, then line CO is the perpendicular bisector of line AB.

IsBisectorOfAngle(BD,ABC).doc_cn: 若BD在角ABC中间，且分割后的两个角相等，则线BD是角ABC的角平分线。
IsBisectorOfAngle(BD,ABC).doc_en: If BD is between angles ABC, and after the division, the two resulting angles are equal, then line BD is the angle bisector of angle ABC.

IsMedianOfTriangle(AD,ABC).doc_cn: 三角形ABC顶点A与底边BC的中点D的连线，称为三角形的中线。
IsMedianOfTriangle(AD,ABC).doc_en: The line segment connecting vertex A and the midpoint D of the base BC of triangle ABC is called the median of the triangle.

IsAltitudeOfTriangle(AD,ABC).doc_cn: 垂直于底边的线段是三角形的高。
IsAltitudeOfTriangle(AD,ABC).doc_en: A line segment perpendicular to the base is the altitude of a triangle.

IsMidsegmentOfTriangle(DE,ABC).doc_cn: 三角形两腰中点的连线是三角形的中位线。
IsMidsegmentOfTriangle(DE,ABC).doc_en: The line connecting the midpoints of the two legs of a triangle is called the midsegment of the triangle.

IsCircumcenterOfTriangle(O,ABC).doc_cn: 三角形三边垂直平分线的交点、外接圆的圆心，是三角形的外心。
IsCircumcenterOfTriangle(O,ABC).doc_en: The point of intersection of the perpendicular bisectors of the three sides of a triangle and the center of the circumcircle is the circumcenter of the triangle
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 三角形{A}{B}{C}的外接圆圆心为{O}
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {O} is the center of the circumscribed circle of triangle {A}{B}{C}
the center of the circumscribed circle of triangle {A}{B}{C} is {O}
{O} is the center of the circumscribed circle of △{A}{B}{C}
the center of the circumscribed circle of △{A}{B}{C} is {O}

IsIncenterOfTriangle(O,ABC).doc_cn: 三角形三边角平分线的交点、内切圆的圆心，是三角形的内心。
IsIncenterOfTriangle(O,ABC).doc_en: The point of intersection of the angle bisectors of the three sides of a triangle and the center of the incircle is the incenter of the triangle.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 三角形{A}{B}{C}的内切圆圆心为{O}
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {O} is the center of the inscribed circle of triangle {A}{B}{C}
the center of the inscribed circle of triangle {A}{B}{C} is {O}
{O} is the center of the inscribed circle of △{A}{B}{C}
the center of the inscribed circle of △{A}{B}{C} is {O}

IsCentroidOfTriangle(O,ABC).doc_cn: 三角形三边的中线的交点是三角形的重心。
IsCentroidOfTriangle(O,ABC).doc_en: The point of intersection of the medians of the three sides of a triangle is the centroid of the triangle.

IsOrthocenterOfTriangle(O,ABC).doc_cn: 三角形三边的高的交点是三角形的垂心。
IsOrthocenterOfTriangle(O,ABC).doc_en: The point of intersection of the altitudes of the three sides of a triangle is the orthocenter of the triangle.

CongruentBetweenTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_cn: 完全一致的两个三角形，称为全等三角形。
CongruentBetweenTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_en: Two triangles that are exactly the same are called congruent triangles.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 三角形{A}{B}{C}与三角形{D}{E}{F}是全等三角形

MirrorCongruentBetweenTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_cn:
镜像完全一致的两个三角形，称为镜像全等三角形。
点一一对应得(ABC,DFE)，不存在三角形DFE，第一个点D不动，将其他点逆序，得(ABC,DEF)。
MirrorCongruentBetweenTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_en:
Two triangles that are mirror images of each other and exactly the same are called mirror congruent triangles. 
Corresponding points (ABC, DFE), and there is no triangle DFE. Keeping the first point D fixed and reversing the order of the other points, we get (ABC, DEF).
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 三角形{A}{B}{C}与三角形{D}{E}{F}是镜像全等三角形
三角形{A}{B}{C}镜像全等于三角形{D}{E}{F}
anti_parse_to_nl_en: triangle {A}{B}{C} is mirror congruent to triangle {D}{E}{F}

SimilarBetweenTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_cn: 成比例的两个三角形，称为相似三角形。
SimilarBetweenTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_en: Two triangles that are in proportion to each other are called similar triangles.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 三角形{A}{B}{C}与三角形{D}{E}{F}是相似三角形

MirrorSimilarBetweenTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_cn: 镜像成比例的两个三角形，称为镜像相似三角形。
MirrorSimilarBetweenTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_en: Two triangles that are mirror images of each other and in proportion to each other are called mirror similar triangles.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 三角形{A}{B}{C}与三角形{D}{E}{F}是镜像相似三角形
三角形{A}{B}{C}镜像相似于三角形{D}{E}{F}
anti_parse_to_nl_en: Triangle {A}{B}{C} is mirror similar to triangle {D}{E}{F}.

IsAltitudeOfQuadrilateral(EF,ABCD).doc_cn: 垂直于底边的线EF是四边形ABCD的高。
IsAltitudeOfQuadrilateral(EF,ABCD).doc_en: The line EF, which is perpendicular to the base, is the height of quadrilateral ABCD.

IsMidsegmentOfQuadrilateral(EF,ABCD).doc_cn: 四边形两腰中点的连线，称为四边形的中位线。
IsMidsegmentOfQuadrilateral(EF,ABCD).doc_en: The line connecting the midpoints of the two legs of a quadrilateral is called the midsegment of the quadrilateral.

IsCircumcenterOfQuadrilateral(O,ABCD).doc_cn: 四边形外接圆的圆心，称为四边形的外心。
IsCircumcenterOfQuadrilateral(O,ABCD).doc_en: The center of the circumcircle of a quadrilateral is called the circumcenter of the quadrilateral.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 四边形{A}{B}{C}{D}外切圆的圆心为{O}
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {O} is the center of the circumscribed circle of quadrilateral {A}{B}{C}{D}
the center of the circumscribed circle of quadrilateral {A}{B}{C}{D} is {O}
{O} is the center of the circumscribed circle of {A}{B}{C}{D}
the center of the circumscribed circle of {A}{B}{C}{D} is {O}

IsIncenterOfQuadrilateral(O,ABCD).doc_cn: 四边形内切圆的圆心，称为四边形的内心。
IsIncenterOfQuadrilateral(O,ABCD).doc_en: The center of the incircle of a quadrilateral is called the incenter of the quadrilateral.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 四边形{A}{B}{C}{D}内切圆的圆心为{O}
anti_parse_to_nl_en: {O} is the center of the inscribed circle of quadrilateral {A}{B}{C}{D}
the center of the inscribed circle of quadrilateral {A}{B}{C}{D} is {O}
{O} is the center of the inscribed circle of {A}{B}{C}{D}
the center of the inscribed circle of {A}{B}{C}{D} is {O}

CongruentBetweenQuadrilateral(ABCD,EFGH).doc_cn: 完全一致的两个四边形，称为全等四边形。
CongruentBetweenQuadrilateral(ABCD,EFGH).doc_en: Two quadrilaterals that are exactly the same are called congruent quadrilaterals.

MirrorCongruentBetweenQuadrilateral(ABCD.doc_cn: 镜像完全一致的两个四边形，称为镜像全等四边形。
MirrorCongruentBetweenQuadrilateral(ABCD.doc_en: Two quadrilaterals that are mirror images of each other and exactly the same are called mirror congruent quadrilaterals.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 四边形{A}{B}{C}{D}镜像全等于四边形{E}{F}{G}{H}
四边形{A}{B}{C}{D}与四边形{E}{F}{G}{H}镜像全等
anti_parse_to_nl_en: quadrilateral {A}{B}{C}{D} is mirror congruent to quadrilateral {E}{F}{G}{H}

SimilarBetweenQuadrilateral(ABCD,EFGH).doc_cn: 成比例的两个四边形，称为相似四边形。
SimilarBetweenQuadrilateral(ABCD,EFGH).doc_en: Two quadrilaterals that are in proportion to each other are called similar quadrilaterals.

MirrorSimilarBetweenQuadrilateral(ABCD,E.doc_cn: 镜像成比例的两个四边形，称为镜像相似四边形。
MirrorSimilarBetweenQuadrilateral(ABCD,E.doc_en: Two quadrilaterals that are mirror images of each other and in proportion to each other are called mirror similar quadrilaterals.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 四边形{A}{B}{C}{D}镜像相似于四边形{E}{F}{G}{H}
四边形{A}{B}{C}{D}与四边形{E}{F}{G}{H}镜像相似
anti_parse_to_nl_en: quadrilateral {A}{B}{C}{D} is mirror similar to quadrilateral {E}{F}{G}{H}

CongruentBetweenArc(OAB,OCD).doc_cn: 完全一致的两个弧，称为全等弧。
CongruentBetweenArc(OAB,OCD).doc_en: Two arcs that are exactly the same are called congruent arcs.

SimilarBetweenArc(OAB,OCD).doc_cn: 成比例的两个弧，称为相似弧。
SimilarBetweenArc(OAB,OCD).doc_en: Two arcs that are in proportion to each other are called similar arcs.

IsTangentOfCircle(PA,O).doc_cn: 过P点做一条直线，若直线与圆只有一个交点，称这个直线是圆的切线。
IsTangentOfCircle(PA,O).doc_en: A straight line passing through point P, if it intersects the circle at only one point, is called a tangent to the circle.

IsCentreOfCircle(P,O).doc_cn: 圆的中心称为圆的圆心。
IsCentreOfCircle(P,O).doc_en: The center of a circle is called the center or the centre of the circle.

LengthOfLine(AB).doc_en: The length of the line AB.

HeightOfTriangle(ABC).doc_cn: 三角形ABC底边BC上的高的长度。
HeightOfTriangle(ABC).doc_en: The length of the altitude on the base BC of triangle ABC.

RatioOfSimilarTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_en: The similarity ratio of similar triangles.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 三角形{A}{B}{C}和三角形{D}{E}{F}的相似比
anti_parse_to_nl_en: the ratio of similar triangles {A}{B}{C} and {D}{E}{F}

RatioOfMirrorSimilarTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_cn: 镜像相似三角形的相似比。
RatioOfMirrorSimilarTriangle(ABC,DEF).doc_en: The similarity ratio of mirror similar triangles.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 三角形{A}{B}{C}和三角形{D}{E}{F}的镜像相似比
anti_parse_to_nl_en: the ratio of mirror similar triangles {A}{B}{C} and {D}{E}{F}
the ratio of mirror similar △{A}{B}{C} and △{D}{E}{F}

HeightOfQuadrilateral(ABCD).doc_cn: 四边形ABCD底边BC上的高的长度。
HeightOfQuadrilateral(ABCD).doc_en: The length of the altitude on the base BC of quadrilateral ABCD.

RatioOfSimilarQuadrilateral(ABCD,EFGH).doc_en: The similarity ratio of similar quadrilaterals.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 四边形{A}{B}{C}{D}和四边形{E}{F}{G}{H}的相似比
anti_parse_to_nl_en: The ratio of similar quadrilaterals {A}{B}{C}{D} and {E}{F}{G}{H}

RatioOfMirrorSimilarQuadrilateral(ABCD,E.doc_cn: 镜像相似四边形的相似比。
RatioOfMirrorSimilarQuadrilateral(ABCD,E.doc_en: The similarity ratio of mirror similar quadrilaterals.
anti_parse_to_nl_cn: 四边形{A}{B}{C}{D}和四边形{E}{F}{G}{H}的镜像相似比
anti_parse_to_nl_en: The ratio of mirror similar quadrilaterals {A}{B}{C}{D} and {E}{F}{G}{H}

MeasureOfArc(OAB).doc_cn:
弧OAB的角度。
与弧OAB所对圆心角的大小相等。
MeasureOfArc(OAB).doc_en:
The measure of arc OAB. 
It is equal to the measure of the central angle of the circle.

RatioOfSimilarArc(OAB,OCD).doc_en: The similarity ratio of similar arcs.
anti_parse_to_nl_en: The ratio of similar arcs {O}{A}{B} and {O}{C}{D}

RadiusOfCircle(O).doc_en: The length of the radius of the circle.

DiameterOfCircle(O).doc_en: The length of the diameter of the circle.
